title: The Key
content:
Vaulted skies above turn gray,
In the field where children play.
Glimpses fade like morning mist,
Even time forgets it kissed.
Nothing stays, and yet we yearn,
Every shadow hides a turn.
Riddles whisper through the trees,
Every answer rides the breeze.

what is the key to solve "syogc"

title: The Clocktower
content:
Cold winds creep through the tower's spine.
All the gears groan out of time.
Echoes hum where shadows sway;
Silent bells have lost their way.
A single chime breaks through the dark,
Restless hands point past the mark.

You climb the spiral, slow and steep,
Till silence folds in shadows deep.
Upon a table, worn and old,
A scrap with secrets, tales untold.
The words are scrawled in faded inkâ€”
Iladpea aol spulz, aol ypkkslz spur.

The clock strikes 7, a crooked sound.
The message lingers, without a bound.
When dawn arrives, your thoughts still race,
But the tower keeps its hidden place.

Where do the riddles link to in this space?
